translation.en: [woman] Peter! [grunts] Peter!
[woman] Peter!
[Peter] Hello, dear.
Look. [breathes heavily]
Look, I know you love Christmas, but there's no need to shag the tree.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du liebst Weihnachten, aber den Baum vögeln?

translation.en: [sobs] It was perfect!
I thought we were gonna decorate the tree together with the children.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir schmücken zusammen mit den Kindern.

translation.en: I don't want their toilet roll decorations.
-It has to be exquisite. -Yes. Anything broken, dear?
translation.de: -Ich will etwas Exquisites. -Ja. Hast du dir was gebrochen?

translation.en: Let me help you.
[woman] For once, I just want this family to have a perfect Christmas.
translation.de: Ich will endlich mal ein perfektes Fest für uns.

translation.en: [Peter] Do you know what would be perfect, darling? The Bahamas.
translation.de: Weißt du, was perfekt wäre, Schatz? Die Bahamas.

translation.en: You, me, the kids, piña coladas.
translation.de: Du, ich, die Kinder, Piña Coladas.

translation.en: Don't be a fool, Peter. We can't take Mummy to the Bahamas.
translation.de: Wir können nicht mit Mum auf die Bahamas.

translation.en: And what would I do about my sisters?
We'll leave the key under the mat. They'll be fine.
translation.de: Wir lassen den Schlüssel da, du hast viel vorgekocht.

translation.en: There's so much to do.
translation.de: Es gibt so viel zu tun.

translation.en: I have to collect the wreath, pick up the kids. Get a new loo brush. Mum's had irritable bowel.
translation.de: Ich muss den Kranz und die Kinder holen. Eine neue Klobürste wegen Mums Reizdarm.

translation.en: -[woman] Redo the tree, obviously. -[chuckles]
And I need to get the presents to the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.de: Und Geschenke zur Nightingale Lodge bringen.

translation.en: Of course you do, dear.
-Well? -And the presents are?
-Upstairs in the bedroom. -Which one, dear? We have many.
translation.de: -Oben im Schlafzimmer. -In welchem? Wir haben viele.

translation.en: -Ours. -Ours?
Well, I suppose that's progress.
Caroline, darling, which bag is it?
[Caroline] Family on the left. Nightingale on the right.
Right.
Darling, my right or bed right?
translation.de: Rechts von mir oder vom Bett aus?

translation.en: For goodness' sake, Peter!
Right. Right.
Right.
-[woman] Happy Christmas! -Thank you. Merry Christmas!
[boy] Look, Daisey, it's Mum!
[Caroline] I'm sorry. I'm here. I'm sorry I'm late.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich zu spät bin.

translation.en: -It's Mum! -[Caroline] Come on, kids.
-Thank you. -It's all right.
Merry Christmas.
-[mother] Merry Christmas. -Bye.
Come on then, kids. So, how was the party?
translation.de: Kommt, Kinder. Und, wie war die Party?

translation.en: Eliza's getting a bra for Christmas. Awesome. Lucky Eliza.
translation.de: -Eliza kriegt einen BH zu Weihnachten. -Toll. Die Glückliche.

translation.en: And how about you? Did you manage to get any chocolate in your mouth?
translation.de: Und du? Wie war deine Schokolade-Ausbeute?

translation.en: -He's eaten ten pieces. -[Caroline] Oh.
I don't want to play Mary. It's too much pressure.
translation.de: Ich will nicht Maria spielen, zu viel Druck.

translation.en: But it's the lead. You're not a supporting actress.
translation.de: Es ist die Hauptrolle. Willst du etwa ein Schaf spielen?

translation.en: -What do you want to be? A sheep? -I have to sing.
translation.de: Es ist die Hauptrolle. Willst du etwa ein Schaf spielen? Ich muss singen.

translation.en: Well, well, well. If it isn't the Virgin Mary.
translation.de: Schaut her, wenn das nicht die Jungfrau Maria ist.

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, Alan.
Not you.
Oh yes. [laughs] Sorry, we're late.
Caroline Christmas-Hope, a lady like you is never late.
translation.de: Caroline, eine Dame wie du kommt nie zu spät.

translation.en: She arrives precisely when she means to.
translation.de: Sie kommt immer genau nach ihrem Plan an.

translation.en: Charmer. Where would you like the presents?
Under the tree, of course.
-[Caroline] Oh, thank you. -Come on, kids.
Oh, Marie!
Not Marie. Caroline!
-Hello, everybody. Merry Christmas. -[man] Merry Christmas.
Edna, dear. You're wearing odd shoes.
She's got another pair just like it.
translation.de: Sie hat das gleiche Paar noch mal.

translation.en: [chuckles] Are you looking forward to the nativity play?
-Daisey's playing the Virgin Mary. -[exasperated] Mum!
I played the Virgin Mary at the National Theatre.
translation.de: Ich spielte die Jungfrau Maria am National Theatre.

translation.en: My God, the people I slept with to get the part!
translation.de: Mein Gott, mit wem ich so schlafen musste, um die Rolle zu bekommen…

translation.en: Bye, everyone.
Run.
[Caroline] Right, everybody out.
[Caroline] There we go. Oh, hang on.
Right. There.
Come on. Chop-chop.
Okay, got everything? Bags? Good. Great. In we go. There we go.
translation.de: Habt ihr alles? Die Tüten? Gut. Dann gehen wir rein.

translation.en: Come on. In we go.
To the right. To the right. This way.
Hey, kids!
I thought we could finish this together.
Why don't we just stick this on top of the tree?
-You know, that's a pretty good idea. -Yeah.
-It is, isn't it? It's a good idea. -Yeah.
Come with me.
That's too much.
[giggles] Yeah.
Do you remember last time? We put it all over the place.
translation.de: Letztes Mal haben wir es überall verteilt.

translation.en: -Do you remember that? -I can make the best mince pies.
translation.de: -Weißt du noch? -Ich mache die besten Mince Pies.

translation.en: It was funny though.
-What are we doing? -Mince pies.
That looks amazing. Well done.
translation.de: Das sieht super aus. Gut gemacht.

translation.en: Look at this mess.
Mum, when's Grandma coming?
Tomorrow, darling.
You're not going to fight with Auntie Joanna, are you?
translation.de: Du wirst nicht mit Tante Joanna streiten, oder?

translation.en: Course not, darling.
It's Christmas.
-Can you hold that? -I will.
Thank you.
Hello, Mummy. Everything's going really well.
This is going to be the best Christmas ever.
-It doesn't have to be perfect, darling. -[Caroline] Yes, it does.
translation.de: -Es muss nicht perfekt sein, Schatz. -Oh doch.

translation.en: I've had 27 years of therapy trying to recalibrate Christmas,
translation.de: Ich war wegen Weihnachten 27 Jahre in Therapie,

translation.en: ever since our shithead of a father abandoned us on Christmas Day.
translation.de: weil unser Scheißkerl von Vater uns an Weihnachten verließ.

translation.en: Don't say it doesn't have to be perfect, 'cause it bloody well has to be.
translation.de: Sag also nicht, dass es nicht perfekt sein muss.

translation.en: So why don't you tell Hamish to put his foot down? You're already late.
translation.de: Hamish soll auf die Tube drücken, ihr seid schon spät dran.

translation.en: [mother] Slight wrinkle.
Hamish is now Felix. She traded in her trader for a new one.
translation.de: Hamish ist jetzt Felix. Sie hat ihren Börsenmakler verkauft.

translation.en: Give me that.
Excellent! Anything else I should know about?
translation.de: Wunderbar. Noch etwas, das ich wissen sollte?

translation.en: [woman] Caroline Christmas-Hope, you need to calm down.
It's only bloody Crimbo. The most important day of the year.
translation.de: -Es ist nur Weihnachten. -Der wichtigste Tag des Jahres.

translation.en: We don't want to stay in the Brontë room this year.
It's too cramped, and we need a really comfortable bed.
translation.de: Es ist zu klein, und wir brauchen ein bequemes Bett.

translation.en: Felix suffers from lumbago.
-Sciatica, darling. I'm not 83. -We'll take the Queen room.
translation.de: -Ischias, Schatz. Ich bin keine 83. -Wir nehmen das Queen-Zimmer.

translation.en: But Mummy has the Queen room.
Her knees are bad, and she actually likes your two awful little banshees.
translation.de: Sie hat's mit den Knien. Und sie mag eure Rotzbengel tatsächlich.

translation.en: I'm allergic to them. So we've agreed to do a swap.
translation.de: Ich nicht, darum haben wir getauscht.

translation.en: -Bye! -Okay.
She's got her chaste little knickers in a twist again, Mummy.
translation.de: Sie macht sich wieder ins Hemd.

translation.en: Joanna Christmas, be nice. We'll be with you in about an hour.
translation.de: Joanna Christmas, sei nett. Wir sind in circa einer Stunde da.

translation.en: [Caroline] Okay.
Bye-bye.
Thanks for the ride. -Hey, hey! -[Daisey] Auntie Vicky!
[Vicky] Hi! Hey!
Hey, sis. -Sis! -Vicky.
Never know how you're gonna turn up. I was hoping for a Red Arrow this year.
translation.de: Man weiß nie, wie du kommst. Ich hoffte dieses Jahr auf eine Red Arrow.

translation.en: Come and see our Christmas tree. We made all the decorations ourselves.
translation.de: Wir zeigen dir unseren Baum. Wir haben die Deko selbst gemacht.

translation.en: Good Lord, darling. Look at that. It's a Rolls-Royce.
translation.de: Meine Güte, das ist ja ein Rolls-Royce.

translation.en: [Peter] That is sick!
Here we are again.
Christmas at Dunnock Manor,
capital of nowhere.
Hello, sis.
Hello.
-Hello. Wow, love the car. -Hi.
Merry Christmas. Hey, this place is absolutely idyllic.
translation.de: Frohe Weihnachten. Hey, was für ein idyllischer Ort.

translation.en: Yes. Hamish, lovely to meet you at last. Heard a lot about you.
translation.de: Ja. Hamish, freut mich sehr. Hab viel von dir gehört.

translation.en: -It's not Hamish. It's Felix. -Felix.
Hamish and Joanna split up.
-Nice outfit. -Oh.
Sexual repression is in. For once in your life, you're ahead of the curve.
translation.de: Sexuelle Zügelung ist in. Endlich bist du mal progressiv.

translation.en: Well, probably for the best. Heard Hamish was a total tosser.
translation.de: Ist wohl besser so. Hamish soll ätzend gewesen sein.

translation.en: -So you're much better. -[laughs] Welcome, Felix.
translation.de: Du bist viel besser. Willkommen, Felix.

translation.en: -Lovely house. -Yes.
-Must have cost a packet. -Well, not really.
I think it was about £10 when one of my feudal ancestors picked it up a few centuries ago.
translation.de: Ich glaube, einer meiner Vorfahren hat vor Jahrhunderten 10 £ bezahlt.

translation.en: -Really? -So no need to be impressed. Nothing to do with me.
-Let me show you around. Come on. -Oh, yes. [laughs]
My wife, uh, Caroline.
-Hi, I'm Felix. -Hello.
-Welcome. -Pleasure.
[Peter] Darling.
Caroline! Caroline, darling. I… I… I think I'm stuck.
translation.de: Caroline, Liebling. Ich glaube, ich stecke fest.

translation.en: No, I… I am actually stuck.
-Hello. -Hello.
Happy Christmas, darling. Can you press that?
translation.de: Frohe Weihnachten. Kannst du das drücken?

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Paulina.
Or is it Doctor of Music Paulina?
Not yet. I've gotta finish my thesis.
translation.de: Noch nicht. Ich schreibe meine Doktorarbeit.

translation.en: Have my boxes arrived? Yes, all of them. [chuckles]
Right, come along. Let's get you inside so you can complete your oeuvre.
translation.de: Gut, gehen wir rein, damit du dein Werk vollenden kannst.

translation.en: The theme was supposed to be "The 12 Days of Christmas."
[Joanna] But you went with the theme of sewage instead.
Nice work.
[Vicky] Hey!
We decorated the Christmas tree with Daddy.
translation.de: Wir haben den Weihnachtsbaum mit Daddy geschmückt.

translation.en: Oh, you really can't tell.
I think it's wonderful. Come and give your grandma a kiss.
translation.de: Ich finde ihn wunderbar. Kommt und gebt Oma einen Kuss.

translation.en: I'm Vicky.
I'm, um…
Down, girl.
I'm Felix.
Hello, Auntie Joanna.
Don't call me Auntie! You know I hate that!
translation.de: Sag nicht Tante. Du weißt, dass ich das hasse.

translation.en: Is my present in there?
Touch it again, and I'll kill you! This bag is worth more than your kidneys.
translation.de: Tu das noch mal, und ich kill dich. Die ist mehr wert als deine Nieren.

translation.en: Do you wanna look in my bag?
-Where did you get all these? -America.
Which parts did you visit? Every part.
Mm. I'm sure you did.
Say thank you.
Thank you, Auntie Vicky.
How on earth did you afford a trip across America? You're always broke.
translation.de: Wovon bist du durch Amerika gereist? Du bist ständig pleite.

translation.en: I couch-surfed. Mattress-surfed, more like.
Felix, are you at the beginning or the end
translation.de: Felix, stehst du am Anfang oder am Ende einer dreimonatigen Beziehung mit ihr?

translation.en: of a three-month relationship with my sister?
translation.de: oder am Ende einer dreimonatigen Beziehung mit ihr?

translation.en: We've been together for ten weeks.
translation.de: Wir sind seit zehn Wochen zusammen.

translation.en: Yes, drinks, anyone? Don't mind if I do.
translation.de: -Mag jemand einen Drink? -Ich hätte nichts dagegen.

translation.en: What a bevy of beauties, eh?
All the sisters gathered together.
I can remember when you lot used to fight like Spitfires and Messerschmitts.
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, wie ihr euch wie Spitfires und Messerschmitts bekämpft habt.

translation.en: And now, four warring nations
translation.de: Und jetzt arbeiten vier verfeindete Nationen

translation.en: peacefully working together in a loving sisterhood.
Delightful! And…
a tribute to that bewitching mother of yours.
-Merry, merry Christmas to all of us! -Merry Christmas!
[all] Merry Christmas!
[boy] Where did you get all this?
translation.de: Wo hast du das alles her?

translation.en: I went into Auntie Joanna's bags.
She said she'd kill us.
She said she'd kill you. Now, sit still.
translation.de: Sie sagte, sie killt dich. Also, sitz ganz still.

translation.en: I need to do your blush.
Well, isn't this nice?
Bloody marvelous. I love Christmas. -Mm-hmm. -Should happen more often.
translation.de: Saumäßig nett. Ich liebe Weihnachten. Sollte es öfter geben.

translation.en: Peter, refill, please.
Yes, dear.
Anyone else?
-Jolly good. -[Caroline chuckles]
Where's Paulina?
In the library working on her thesis.
[sighs] She's been working on her thesis for ten years.
translation.de: Sie schreibt seit zehn Jahren an dieser Arbeit.

translation.en: It's about the Fab Four. Why they split.
translation.de: Es geht um die Fab Four, warum sie sich trennten.

translation.en: We all know why. It's 'cause Robbie wanted a solo career.
translation.de: Das weiß jeder. Robbie wollte eine Solokarriere.

translation.en: Right, I remember that.
No. Not Take That. The Beatles.
Ah, the '60s.
Sex and drugs and rock 'n' roll.
But mostly sex.
Well, if Paulina won't come to us, maybe we should go to her.
translation.de: Kommt Paulina nicht zu uns, dann gehen wir zu ihr.

translation.en: Oh! And I have something to show you all in the library. Very exciting. Come on!
translation.de: Und ich will euch in der Bibliothek was Spannendes zeigen. Los.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, dear.
Paulina, are you really going to spend the next three days in a darkened room?
translation.de: Willst du wirklich drei Tage in einem dunklen Raum verbringen?

translation.en: I want to be left alone and write the ultimate dissertation
translation.de: Ich will allein sein und die ultimative Arbeit

translation.en: about the greatest rock band in the history of the world.
translation.de: über die größte Band aller Zeiten schreiben.

translation.en: Oh, so you're writing about U2 now as well?
translation.de: Du schreibst also auch über U2?

translation.en: Felix, would you like to see some family photos?
Oh, I'd love to.
Of when I was growing up, and Joanna was at university.
translation.de: Als ich Heranwachsende und Joanna Studentin war.

translation.en: I was ahead of my time. We're practically twins. [sarcastic chuckle] A decade apart.
Forty-five and still--
Thirty-five! I'm thirty-five.
Younger than me. Interesting.
[chuckles] Sorry. I'd just like to go over the itinerary for the next few days.
translation.de: Ich möchte den Plan für die nächsten Tage durchgehen.

translation.en: God, she's got a planner. Christmas Eve is the grand buffet.
translation.de: -Gott, ein Plan. -Heiligabend ist das große Buffet.

translation.en: Therefore tonight is heavy appetizers.
If you're all still hungry, go to the Plough Inn.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, das deckt euren Bedarf.

translation.en: Oh, Vicky, you like a good plowing.
translation.de: Vicky, du lässt dich doch gern decken.

translation.en: That's 'cause I'm still young enough to sow my oats.
translation.de: Weil man mich noch decken will.

translation.en: [Caroline] Yes, and tomorrow we have the Howden Christmas Fair,
translation.de: Ja, und morgen haben wir den Howden-Weihnachtsmarkt,

translation.en: which, as always, will be oodles of fun.
translation.de: der wie immer ein Riesenspaß wird.

translation.en: But I've just got to Yoko. The fair is a Christmas tradition.
translation.de: -Aber ich bin grade bei Yoko. -Der Markt ist eine Tradition.

translation.en: Christmas Day, we've got a nativity play at the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.de: Am 1. Weihnachtstag haben wir ein Krippenspiel in der Nightingale Lodge.

translation.en: Ooh, love a whiff of urine and old fart on Christmas Day.
translation.de: Ich liebe den Duft von Urin und Senioren an Weihnachten.

translation.en: Joanna, maybe we can get you a room.
translation.de: Vielleicht ist für dich ein Zimmer frei.

translation.en: Please, could we just be a family and have a lovely Christmas?
translation.de: Bitte, können wir einfach eine Familie sein und ein schönes Fest haben?

translation.en: [whispers] Thank you.
So, Boxing Day--
Which happens to be a very special day because--
translation.de: -Ein besonderer Tag, weil ich da… -Peter, bitte.

translation.en: -Yes, Peter, please. -I married the love of my life.
translation.de: -Ein besonderer Tag, weil ich da… -Peter, bitte. …meine große Liebe geheiratet habe.

translation.en: Wow! Really?
That's brilliant. [laughs]
And I was your bridesmaid.
-And I was-- -The old maid.
So, rooms.
You know what? We're gonna go stay at the Plough Inn.
-We are? -But why? Your room's all ready.
-I just carried everything upstairs. -And you can bring them down again.
I refuse to spend another night under the same roof as you.
translation.de: Ich verbringe keine Nacht mehr mit dir unter einem Dach.

translation.en: Okay. [laughs]
That's not very Christmassy.
[Peter] You sure you can't convince her to stay? The Plough Inn is no Savoy.
translation.de: Kannst du sie nicht überzeugen? Das Plough Inn ist kein Savoy.

translation.en: [chuckles] Joanna is very strong-willed. Probably not worth the fight.
translation.de: Sie ist sehr willensstark. Das lohnt sich nicht.

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, you can always come back here.
translation.de: Ihr könnt jederzeit wiederkommen und mein Zimmer haben.

translation.en: -You can have my room. -Your room?
translation.de: Ihr könnt jederzeit wiederkommen und mein Zimmer haben. Dein Zimmer?

translation.en: Are you not sleeping in the same room as your wife?
translation.de: Ihr schlaft nicht in einem Zimmer?

translation.en: Uh, apparently, I snore, spin, steal the bedsheets… Generally annoying.
translation.de: Anscheinend schnarche ich. Ich wälze mich, klaue ihre Decke, bin generell nervig.

translation.en: How long you been married? It'll be 18 years on Boxing Day.
translation.de: -Wie lange seid ihr verheiratet? -Am 2. Weihnachtstag werden es 18 Jahre.

translation.en: And how long you been sleeping by yourself?
translation.de: Und seit wann schläfst du allein?

translation.en: Eighteen months.
-So no… -No, no.
[inhales deeply] Not for a while, no.
Can I ask you a question?
Sure.
How old is Joanna?
For… for… thirties. Thereabouts.
translation.de: Vier… dreißig und ein paar Zerquetschte. Ungefähr.

translation.en: I think she's the one.
-Really? -Yeah.
Good for you.
No one in this family respects what I'm doing.
translation.de: Niemand in dieser Familie respektiert, was ich tue.

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to John, Paul, George, and Ringo.
translation.de: Ich habe mein Leben John, Paul, George und Ringo gewidmet.

translation.en: Paulina, even the Beatles didn't dedicate their lives to the Beatles.
translation.de: Paulina, nicht einmal die Beatles widmeten ihr Leben den Beatles.

translation.en: God, I loathe our little sister.
translation.de: Gott, ich hasse unsere kleine Schwester.

translation.en: Um, would you like a plate?
I'm not hungry.
Food!
You take one more step towards me,
I swear to God, I will rip out your larynx and wrap it round your tits.
translation.de: und ich reiße dir die Wirbelsäule raus und wickle sie um deine Titten.

translation.en: Take a joke, Joanna.
You'd think you'd be able to at your age.
translation.de: Das sollte noch drin sein in deinem Alter.

translation.en: These were for tomorrow.
Dad's in Florida.
What?
How do you know?
I saw him.
From a distance?
-I stayed with him. -[gasps]
You stayed with him?
-For a week. Maybe two. -[inaudible] Oh my God.
-[gasps] -With Jackie.
-That's his-- -[Caroline] Hello, Mum! [laughs]
What are you girls talking about?
Oh, you know. Christmas.
Yummy.
Mum, your buttons are all done wrong on your blouse.
translation.de: Mum, deine Bluse ist falsch zugeknöpft.

translation.en: Silly me. I'm losing the plot.
You'll have to get a room for me at Nightingale Lodge.
translation.de: Ihr müsst mich in der Nightingale Lodge unterbringen.

translation.en: -[Caroline laughs nervously] -You can share Joanna's.
-Would you like a plate? -[Elizabeth] Mm. Thank you.
-Did you make this, darling? -Yes, it's for tomorrow.
Silly me, asking about your private life. -[Peter chuckles] -I didn't mean to intrude.
translation.de: Blöde Fragen nach deinem Privatleben. Ich will mich nicht einmischen.

translation.en: Please, do not worry about it.
That's marriage.
Really?
Oh yes. You'll find out soon enough.
It's wonderful. [chuckles]
Vicky, when you went to Florida, did you by any chance invite anyone for Christmas?
translation.de: Hast du in Florida zufällig jemanden zu Weihnachten eingeladen?

translation.en: I might have done. Who on earth comes from Florida?
translation.de: -Vielleicht schon. -Wer in aller Welt kommt aus Florida?

translation.en: Do you think that was a good idea,
or that maybe you should have asked the host first?
translation.de: du hättest vorher die Gastgeber fragen sollen?

translation.en: -Did he come? -They came.
-Is it who I think it is? -[squeaky] Mm-hmm!
No way!
Who is it, darling?
Yeah, well, whoever it is, I'm gonna let them in, darling.
translation.de: Wer immer es ist, ich lasse sie rein.

translation.en: I mean, it's cold outside.
Especially if they have come all the way from Florida. [chuckles]
translation.de: Vor allem, wenn man in Florida lebt.

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone.
Girls.
I know it's been a long time.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist lange her.

translation.en: Uh, this is my girlfriend, Jackie.
Hi! [giggles] It's so nice to meet you all.
translation.de: Hi! Es ist so schön, euch alle kennenzulernen.

translation.en: Oh my God! This castle is so adorable.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, dieses Schloss ist so bezaubernd.

translation.en: How could Princess Meghan leave this?
I… I should introduce myself. I'm your son-in-law.
-Yes. It's a pleasure. -Yeah.
Hello.
Hi. I'm, uh, Joanna's boyfriend, Felix.
translation.de: Hi. Ich bin Joannas Freund, Felix.

translation.en: Right.
[gasps] Hi.
-Hi. [chuckles] -Yes, hi.
-[James] Lilibet? -[gasps]
Y'all drink proper tea and everything.
translation.de: Ihr trinkt ja richtig Tee und so.

translation.en: And look at the decorations!
translation.de: Und sieh dir die Dekoration an!

translation.en: This is the most awesome Christmas.
And I love that you recycle. I saw the tree.
translation.de: Und es ist toll, dass ihr recycelt. Ich sehe das Bäumchen.

translation.en: This is so damn typical of you.
translation.de: Das ist so typisch für dich.

translation.en: Thinking nothing of taking a big crap over the rest of us,
translation.de: Du kackst uns vor die Tür und erwartest,

translation.en: and expecting someone else, usually me, to clean it up.
translation.de: dass jemand es wegmacht, meistens ich.

translation.en: That is so unfair.
-He's got old, hasn't he? -[scoffs] It's been 27 years.
translation.de: -Er ist alt geworden, oder? -Es ist 27 Jahre her.

translation.en: Did you see his girlfriend? I know. She looks like she's only a couple of years older than me.
translation.de: -Habt ihr seine Freundin gesehen? -Sie sieht nur minimal älter als ich aus.

translation.en: And what is up with his American accent?
translation.de: Und was soll sein amerikanischer Akzent?

translation.en: He's like the oldest swinger in town.
translation.de: Er ist der älteste Swinger der Stadt.

translation.en: So you live in…
